fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: The title of the page. This is used to display the title in the CMS

fields.name: metaTitle
fields.label: Meta Title
fields.description: The title of the page, displayed in the browser tab, in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the title field will be used.

fields.name: metaDescription
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: The description of the page, displayed in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the heading field will be used.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: The title of the page. This is used to display the title in the CMS

fields.name: metaTitle
fields.label: Meta Title
fields.description: The title of the page, displayed in the browser tab, in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the title field will be used.

fields.name: metaDescription
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: The description of the page, displayed in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the heading field will be used.

fields.name: image
fields.label: Image
fields.description: Aspect ratio needs to be 16:9. On mobile it will be cropped into a 5:7, so please keep the subject in the center.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: The title of the page. This is used to display the title in the CMS

fields.name: metaTitle
fields.label: Meta Title
fields.description: The title of the page, displayed in the browser tab, in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the title field will be used.

fields.name: metaDescription
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: The description of the page, displayed in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the heading field will be used.

fields.name: websiteImage
fields.label: Website Image
fields.description: The image used when sharing the website on social media. Size must be 1200 X 630 pixels.

fields.name: metaTitle
fields.label: Meta Title
fields.description: The title of the page, displayed in the browser tab, in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the title field will be used.

fields.name: metaDescription
fields.label: Meta Description
fields.description: The description of the page, displayed in Google search results and in social media shares. If not provided, the first 160 characters of the description field will be used.

fields.name: isActive
fields.label: Is Active
fields.description: If active, the case will be displayed on the website.

fields.name: isShowcased
fields.label: Is Showcased
fields.description: If showcased, the case will be displayed on the homepage.

fields.name: showcaseOrder
fields.label: Showcase Order
fields.description: Use only if the case is showcased. The order in which the cases are displayed on the homepage. Lower numbers come first.

fields.name: mainImage
fields.label: Main Image
fields.description: Will be used on the project grid and on the project page. Also on the homepage, if no video loop is provided.

fields.name: image16by9
fields.label: Image 16:9
fields.description: The aspect ratio must be 16:9.

fields.name: image5by7
fields.label: Image 5:7
fields.description: The aspect ratio must be 5:7. If not provided, the 16:9 image will be used and cropped when necessary

fields.name: image4by3
fields.label: Image 4:3
fields.description: The aspect ratio must be 4:3. If not provided, the 16:9 image will be used and cropped when necessary.

fields.name: mainVideo
fields.label: Main Video
fields.description: Enter the Vimeo video ID

fields.name: videoLoop
fields.label: Video Loop
fields.description: Will be used on the homepage, if provided. If not provided, the main image will be used.

fields.name: loop16by9
fields.label: Loop 16:9
fields.description: Enter the Vimeo video ID. The aspect ratio must be 16:9. Cropping on either sides may happen depending on user screen size.

fields.name: loop9by16
fields.label: Loop 9:16
fields.description: Enter the Vimeo video ID. The aspect ratio must be 9:16. Cropping on top / bottom may happen depending on user screen size

fields.name: optionalBlocks
fields.label: Optional Blocks
fields.description: Use these blocks to add additional content to the project page.

fields.name: aspectRatioWidth
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Width
fields.description: For instance, for a 16:9 aspect ratio, enter 16.

fields.name: aspectRatioHeight
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Height
fields.description: For instance, for a 16:9 aspect ratio, enter 9.

fields.name: aspectRatioWidth
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Width
fields.description: For instance, for a 16:9 aspect ratio, enter 16. The 2 images must have the same aspect ratio.

fields.name: aspectRatioHeight
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Height
fields.description: For instance, for a 16:9 aspect ratio, enter 9. The 2 images must have the same aspect ratio.

fields.name: isStackedOnMobile
fields.label: Stack on Mobile
fields.description: If checked, the images will be displayed on top of each other on mobile devices.

fields.name: aspectRatioWidth
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Width
fields.description: For instance, for a 16:9 aspect ratio, enter 16. The 3 images must have the same aspect ratio.

fields.name: aspectRatioHeight
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Height
fields.description: For instance, for a 16:9 aspect ratio, enter 9. The 3 images must have the same aspect ratio.

fields.name: video
fields.label: Video
fields.description: Enter the Vimeo video ID

fields.name: autoplay
fields.label: Autoplay
fields.description: If checked, the video will start playing automatically, without sound nor controls.

fields.name: aspectRatioWidth
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Width
fields.description: For instance, for a 16:9 aspect ratio, enter 16.

fields.name: aspectRatioHeight
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Height
fields.description: For instance, for a 16:9 aspect ratio, enter 9.

fields.name: videoOne
fields.label: Video 1
fields.description: Enter the Vimeo video ID. Use only for vertical videos.

fields.name: videoTwo
fields.label: Video 2
fields.description: Enter the Vimeo video ID. Use only for vertical videos.

fields.name: videoThree
fields.label: Video 3
fields.description: Enter the Vimeo video ID. Use only for vertical videos.

fields.name: aspectRatioWidth
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Width
fields.description: For instance, for a 9:16 aspect ratio, enter 9. The 3 videos must have the same aspect ratio.

fields.name: aspectRatioHeight
fields.label: Aspect Ratio Height
fields.description: For instance, for a 9:16 aspect ratio, enter 16. The 3 videos must have the same aspect ratio.

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
